EmailTemplate.name: 2016 Q1 Followup Email (Attendees).2016 Q1 Followup Email (attendees)
EmailTemplate.subject: Partner Town Hall: Thank you for attending!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Partner}}, Thank you for joining us yesterday at our Partner Town Hall Meeting. We hope you were able to get a good overview of what's in store for the channel in 2016! Here are the 2 key initiatives to take advantage of:
- Join the Green Circle: Our online community where you can access all resources, like training materials, industry insight, informative forums and make the most of your partnership with VMTurbo. Click here to sign in <[[https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?inviteID=12005]]>.
- VMTurbo App: The new VMTurbo App is designed to offer our channel partners easy access to our sales and technical resources, accreditation, company updates, and more. If you havenâ€™t downloaded the app, click here for iPhone <[[https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/vmturbo-sales-ready/id1070007765?ls=1&mt=8]]> or click here for Android <[[https://play.google.com/store/search?q=vmturbo&c=apps&hl=en]]>.
This webcast was recorded, click here to view the recording <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/recording/2208573985598771713]]> and click here to access the slide deck <[[https://vmturbo.partnerprm.com/RSW/DocReg_profile.aspx?R=8ED2E7BF709F5AD3052337EC00A01A0F]]>. Feel free to share with your team and colleagues. Hope to see you on our next Partner Town Hall Meeting on April 6, 2016 at 12 PM EST. Click here to register in advance <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/844254877771303169]]>! Best, Sean Sean Finnegan Director of Channel Sales
